issue.title: Camera Stops Sending Image Messages After World Reset

content.raw:
That would be superb!  If you can do that, thanks a lot!  

We'd simply use Gazebo 7, however it doesn't work well with our large scale camera use in virtual machines.  In 6 we're just fixing the [Z ordering issue](#!/osrf/gazebo/issues/1837/vmware-rendering-z-ordering-appears-random), whereas in 7 it causes crashes.
content.html:
That would be superb! If you can do that, thanks a lot!

We'd simply use Gazebo 7, however it doesn't work well with our large scale camera use in virtual machines. In 6 we're just fixing the Z ordering issue, whereas in 7 it causes crashes.
